problem.p: An image mapped input problem presents an image for the student. Input is given by the location of mouse clicks on the image. Correctness of input can be evaluated based on expected dimensions of a rectangle.

In the image below, because a rectangular space of this image has been specified (via coordinates), you can click the image within that specified range and get the right answer. To create a problem of this sort, you would need the following snippet of code:
Which animal shown below is a kitten?

div.p: The animal on the right is a kitten. The animal on the left is a puppy, not a kitten.
